response.overview: A serial killer that is loose in the city of Syracuse New York and he believes that everyone he kills will be transformed into his own kingdom in hell for them to worship him. This man is tormented by his past as a young boy and the relationship between him and his father, who tells him women are evil and should be punished for their sins. A police profiler/detective from New York City who has his own demons is called in to help the local police with the investigation to catch the killer.
response.title: Transformation
